Uses of Package
net.java.jddac.jmdi.service

Packages that use net.java.jddac.jmdi.service
net.java.jddac.common.util Provides miscellaneous utility and helper objects used by various APIs within JDDAC. 
net.java.jddac.jmdi.comm Provides the communication transport functionality in Java Measurement Dataflow Interface (JMDI). 
net.java.jddac.jmdi.comm.xml Provides the XML encoding and decoding libraries used for network communications in Java Measurement Dataflow Interface (JMDI). 
net.java.jddac.jmdi.fblock Provides various Function Blocks used in Java Measurement Dataflow Interface (JMDI). 
net.java.jddac.jmdi.service Provides the Service classes specified in the IEEE 1451.1 specifications and used in Java Measurement Dataflow Interface (JMDI). 
net.java.jddac.jmdi.transducer Provides the measurement data sources. 
 

Classes in net.java.jddac.jmdi.service used by net.java.jddac.common.util
PublisherPort
          The Publisher Port class provides publisher-side functionality for a publish-subscribe communication model.
SubscriberCallback
          Entities which are to be called back by the SubscriberPort with a subscription need to implement this interface.
SubscriberPort
          Provides Entities objects with a mechanism for subscribing to publications.

Classes in net.java.jddac.jmdi.service used by net.java.jddac.jmdi.service
BasePort
          The BasePort base class is the root for the class hierarchy of all communication Port Objects used to send communications via the underlying communication network.
CommFabric
          The CommFabric class is a singleton class for remote and local communication.

          The listener interface for receiving messages delivered via the communications fabric.
